Functions

void ZCL_ResetSecurity (void)
 Resets the security component of ZCL. Resets the Key Establishment cluster if Certicom security is used.
void ZCL_Set (ZCL_Set_t *req)
 Sets security parameters in ZCL.
void ZCL_Get (ZCL_Get_t *req)
 Gets security parameters from ZCL.
void ZCL_StartSecurityReq (ZCL_StartSecurityReq_t *req)
 Initializes the KE cluster, discovers KE devices and performs key establishment.

Detailed Description

The header file describes the ZCL Security Manager and its interface.

The file describes the types and interface of the ZCL Security Manager

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum ZCL_SecurityStatus_t

Enumerated status values used in by the security procedures in ZCL.

Enumerator:
ZCL_SECURITY_STATUS_SUCCESS 

Key establishment completed successfully, or the Certicom security mode is not used.

Definition at line 33 of file zclSecurityManager.h.

enum ZCL_SecurityAttrId_t

Security variable identifier type. Used by ZCL_Set() and ZCL_Get() function to define variable to write or read.

Enumerator:
ZCL_LINK_KEY_DESC_ID 

Link key descriptor

ZCL_NETWORK_KEY_ID 

Network key
